scripts.auth: cd ../masterchat/extra/credential-fetcher && npm i && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:dependencies && npm run build:project
scripts.build:dependencies: cd ../masterchat && npm i && npm run build
scripts.start:mock: cross-env NODE_ENV=debug IS_MOCK_LIVESTREAM=true nodemon --watch dist/debug --inspect dist/debug/app.js
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e debug.env npx prisma db push
scripts.db:pull: dotenv -e debug.env npx prisma db pull
scripts.migrate:debug: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true NODE_ENV=debug dotenv -e debug.env ts-node src/scripts/migrations/applySchemaMigrations.ts
scripts.migrate:schema: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true NODE_ENV=debug dotenv -e debug.env ts-node src/scripts/migrations/migrateSchema.ts
scripts.migrate:debug_deprecated: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true NODE_ENV=debug dotenv -e debug.env ts-node src/scripts/migrations/applyMigrations
scripts.migrate:data_deprecated: cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true NODE_ENV=debug dotenv -e debug.env ts-node src/scripts/migrations/migrateData.ts
scripts.migrate:release: yarn run db:dump && dotenv -e release.env npx prisma migrate deploy
